# Statamic Livewire Filters

> A Laravel Livewire addon for Statamic CMS that enables real-time, reactive filtering of collections without page reloads. Perfect for e-commerce product filtering, directory listings, blog archives, and any Laravel/Statamic project requiring dynamic collection filtering.

Livewire Filters lets you add live filtering to Statamic collections using familiar Antlers syntax. No Livewire knowledge required - just swap your collection tag and add filter components.

- **Website**: https://livewirefilters.com
- **Demo**: https://demo.livewirefilters.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/reachweb/statamic-livewire-filters

## Documentation

- [Overview](https://livewirefilters.com/overview): Introduction to Livewire Filters and its features

- [Livewire Collection Tag](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/livewire-collection-tag): The main component that replaces your collection tag

## Filter Components

- [Text Filter](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/text-filter): Live search text input with conditions like "contains"
- [Radio Filter](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/radio-filter): Single-choice filtering using radio buttons
- [Select Filter](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/select-filter): Dropdown-based filtering with optional search
- [Checkbox Filter](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/checkbox-filter): Multiple-choice filtering with checkboxes
- [Date Filter](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/date-filter): Filter entries by date using Flatpickr
- [Range Filter](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/range-filter): Single range slider for numeric values
- [Dual Range Filter](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/dual-range-filter): Min/max range selection with noUiSlider
- [Toggle Filter](https://livewirefilters.com/usage/toggle-filter): Boolean toggle for preset filter values

## Additional Features

- [Sorting](https://livewirefilters.com/sorting): Sort entries by any field dynamically
- [Tags Component](https://livewirefilters.com/tags): Display active filters as removable tags/pills
- [Query Scopes](https://livewirefilters.com/advanced/query-scopes): Advanced filtering with custom Laravel query scopes
- [URL Query String](https://livewirefilters.com/advanced/url-query-string): SEO-friendly shareable URLs with filter parameters
- [Transitions & Animations](https://livewirefilters.com/advanced/transitions-animations): Add visual effects to filter updates
- [Hooks](https://livewirefilters.com/advanced/hooks): Extend functionality with Statamic hooks
